name: trailverse
description: TrailVerse - Your Universe of National Parks Exploration

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd client && npm run test:vitest" "cd server && npm run test:watch"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:client:coverage && npm run test:server:coverage
